text:
="preserve">Dannes Arcenio Coronel Campoverde (May 24, 1973 – July 7, 2020) was an Ecuadorian football defender. He was born in the Guayas Province, Ecuador. Coronel made 27 appearances for the Ecuador national team between 1992 and 2000. He also played for Emelec, El Nacional
and Barcelona.
Coronel died of a heart attack on July 7, 2020 in the Guayas Province, aged 47.
